name: orka-auth-control-plane
description: A serverless control plane that centralizes authentication, per-service sessions, subscriptions, quotas, and authorization decisions for multi-service products.

userStories.title: Database schema migration - Core tables
userStories.description: Create migration file with new core tables: tenants (id, name, global_quota_limit), tenant_users (tenant_id, user_id, role), updated sessions with service field.
acceptanceCriteria: Migration file created in migrations/ folder
tenants table with id, name, global_quota_limit, created_at, updated_at
tenant_users table with tenant_id, user_id, role, created_at
sessions table updated with service field
Migration runs without errors: npm run db:init:local

userStories.title: Database schema migration - API keys and usage
userStories.description: Create/update api_keys table with scopes, quota_limit, quota_period, created_by, last_used_at, expires_at, revoked_at. Create usage_events table with idempotency_key.
acceptanceCriteria: api_keys table has all required columns
usage_events table created with tenant_id, api_key_id, user_id, service, action, quantity, period, timestamp, idempotency_key
Proper indexes on frequently queried columns

userStories.title: Database schema migration - Features, overrides, webhooks
userStories.description: Create feature_flags, admin_overrides, webhook_endpoints, webhook_events tables.
acceptanceCriteria: feature_flags table with id, name, enabled_tiers, enabled_tenants, rollout_percentage, active
admin_overrides table with id, tenant_id, type, value, reason, granted_by, expires_at, created_at
webhook_endpoints table with id, tenant_id, url, events, active
webhook_events table with id, endpoint_id, event_type, payload, delivered_at
subscription_items table with id, subscription_id, service, enabled

userStories.title: Strong consistency wrapper for D1
userStories.description: Create utility function that enforces strong consistency for all auth-path D1 reads.

userStories.title: KV fallback cache for D1 outages
userStories.description: Implement KV-based caching for auth decisions with fallback on D1 failure.
acceptanceCriteria: KV namespace binding added to wrangler.toml
Cache wrapper function that stores successful auth decisions
Fallback logic that returns cached result with degraded: true on D1 error
TTL of 60 seconds for cached decisions

userStories.title: Typed repository pattern - Base implementation
userStories.description: Create base repository pattern replacing adapter abstraction. Create AuthRepository with typed methods.
acceptanceCriteria: All methods properly typed with generics

userStories.title: Tenant service - CRUD operations
userStories.description: Implement TenantService with create, read, update, delete operations for tenants.

userStories.title: Tenant-user relationships
userStories.description: Implement tenant-user association with roles (owner, admin, member).

userStories.title: JWT redesign with jose library
userStories.description: Replace manual JWT implementation with jose. Support session and API key JWT formats.
acceptanceCriteria: Session JWT: { sub, tenant_id, session_id, aud, exp }
API Key JWT: { sub (tenant), api_key_id, scope, aud, exp }
signJWT and verifyJWT functions using jose

userStories.title: JWKS endpoint for public key distribution
userStories.description: Implement /.well-known/jwks.json endpoint for services to verify JWTs.
acceptanceCriteria: Returns public keys in JWKS format

userStories.title: Per-service sessions
userStories.description: Modify session model for per-service sessions (one session per user+tenant+service).
acceptanceCriteria: Login creates/updates session for specific service

userStories.title: API key generation and storage
userStories.description: Implement API key creation with secure generation, hashing, and storage.
acceptanceCriteria: Key stored as SHA-256 hash (never plaintext)

userStories.title: API key validation and JWT exchange
userStories.description: Implement API key validation endpoint that exchanges key for JWT.
acceptanceCriteria: Returns JWT with api_key_id and scopes

userStories.title: API key management endpoints
userStories.description: Implement CRUD endpoints for API key management.
acceptanceCriteria: Only tenant admins/owners can manage keys

userStories.title: Enhanced subscription model
userStories.description: Update subscriptions to be tenant-based with tier and period tracking.

userStories.title: Subscription items for per-service enablement
userStories.description: Implement subscription_items for enabling/disabling services per subscription.

userStories.title: Usage tracking with idempotency
userStories.description: Implement usage event recording with idempotent increments.

userStories.title: Hierarchical quota checking
userStories.description: Implement quota checking at per-key and global tenant levels.
acceptanceCriteria: checkQuota function checks per-key limit first

userStories.title: Feature flags implementation
userStories.description: Implement feature flag system with tier, tenant, and rollout support.

userStories.title: Admin overrides system
userStories.description: Implement admin overrides for quota boosts, tier upgrades, feature grants.
acceptanceCriteria: createOverride with reason and granted_by audit fields

userStories.title: Core authorize() function
userStories.description: Implement central authorize() that checks session, subscription, quota, RBAC, flags, overrides.
acceptanceCriteria: Checks in order: session -> subscription -> service enabled -> flags -> quota -> RBAC -> overrides
Uses strong consistency for all reads

userStories.title: Authorize API endpoint
userStories.description: Create POST /api/authorize endpoint for services to call.

userStories.title: Webhook endpoints management
userStories.description: Implement webhook endpoint registration for tenants.

userStories.title: Webhook event emission
userStories.description: Implement event emission when state changes occur.
acceptanceCriteria: Events: subscription.upgraded, subscription.downgraded, user.added_to_tenant, api_key.revoked, quota.exceeded

userStories.title: R2 backup system
userStories.description: Implement scheduled worker for daily D1 backups to R2.
acceptanceCriteria: Exports: users, tenants, subscriptions, api_keys, sessions

userStories.title: Structured logging enhancement
userStories.description: Enhance logging middleware with structured JSON and request correlation.

userStories.title: API routes - Tenant management
userStories.description: Create API routes for tenant CRUD and user management.

userStories.title: API routes - Subscription and quota
userStories.description: Create API routes for subscription and usage endpoints.

userStories.title: API routes - Feature flags and overrides
userStories.description: Create admin API routes for feature flags and overrides.

userStories.title: Unit tests for core services
userStories.description: Write unit tests for AuthService, TenantService, QuotaService.

userStories.title: Integration tests for auth flows
userStories.description: Write integration tests for complete auth flows.
acceptanceCriteria: Test: API key create -> exchange -> authorize

userStories.title: Update README and API documentation
userStories.description: Update README with new architecture and document all endpoints.
